active_skill.description:
Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing Fire DMG to enemies within range and accumulating Fire Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier:
864%/921%/979%/1036%/1094%

Daze Multiplier: 
316%/337%/358%/379%/400%

Cooldown 16s

additional_ability.name: Refueling
additional_ability.description: When there are 2 or more Fire Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% more Anomaly Buildup.

chain_attack.name: Ka-Boom Express Shipping
chain_attack.description:
Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing Fire DMG to enemies in a large area and inflicting massive Fire Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier:
814%/868%/923%/977%/1031%

Daze Multiplier: 
117%/124%/132%/140%/148%
